member.name: T:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.SpriteRenderer
member.summary: Represents a class for rendering sprites in the ScapeCore engine.
member.remarks: This class is derived from the Renderer class and specializes in rendering sprite visuals.

member.name: P:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.SpriteRenderer.rtransform
member.summary: Gets or sets the for the sprite.
member.remarks: The RectTransform property represents the transformation information for positioning, scaling, and rotating the sprite.

member.name: P:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.SpriteRenderer.spriteEffects
member.summary: Gets or sets the for the sprite rendering.
member.remarks: The SpriteEffects property represents the rendering effects applied to the sprite, such as flipping or rotating.

member.name: P:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.SpriteRenderer.depth
member.summary: Gets or sets the rendering depth of the sprite.
member.remarks: The Depth property represents the depth at which the sprite is rendered, affecting its layering in the scene.

member.name: M:ScapeCore.Core.Engine.Components.SpriteRenderer.#ctor
